embed.description: Edit or resend the embed for the ticket creation

channel.description: The channel where the embed can be resend

color.description: Allow to changing the color. Hexadecimal value, rgb value, or via a color name
color.name: color

edit.description: Edit the embed for the ticket creation

error.invalidColor: The color is not valid. You must use a hexadecimal value, a rgb value (in the format `(1, 2, 3)` or `[1,2,3]`) or [a color name from this list](https://old.discordjs.dev/#/docs/discord.js/main/typedef/Colors)

thumbnail.description: The image to add to the embed
thumbnail.name: thumbnail

embed.name: embed

resend.channel: the channel where to recreate the embed
resend.description: Recreate the embed from the template

error.notSend: The message was not send for an unknown reason.

resend.name: recreate

error.attachment: Error while editing the template: the message has no attachment.
error.channel: Error while editing the template: message not found.You need to use the command in the same channel the template JSON was saved.

field.exist: Error while editing the template: the field `{{-field}}` already exist.
field.notfound: Error while editing the template: the field `{{- field}}` was not found.
field.tooMuch: Error while editing the template: the template has too much fields. You can't have more than 5 fields.

error.footer: Error while editing the template: the embed footer is not in the good format.
error.notFound: The message was not found: you need to use the command in the template's channel.
error.textChannel: This command can only be used in a text channel

add.description: Add a field to the template
add.name: add

command.description: Edit the fields of the template

edit.description: Edit a field of the template

remove.description: Delete a field from the template
remove.name: delete

command.title: fields

field.id: The field's id (short/simple). Use it in the thread name with the "{{value}}" syntax
field.name: The field name
field.type: The field type, paragraph or short

messageId.description: The message ID of the embed. You must use the command in the same channel as the embed.
messageId.title: message_id

modal.description:
{{- user}} created a new ticket !
 Here are the informations provided by the user:

channel.description: The channel where the ticket will be created

role.description: The role of people who need to be added to the template

thread_name.description: The thread name. Can use field ids with the syntax "{{value}}"
thread_name.name: thread_name

rename.description: Edit the template of the ticket name
rename.title: rename

choice.description: If you want to add or remove roles
choice.name: choice

role.description: Edit the role of the template
The role to add or remove
